did.abstract: Collection consists of a diary giving a brief description of the diarist's journey by the steamboat "Carolina" from Augusta, Ga., to Savannah, and thence by sailing vessel, a voyage of five days, to New York. Also included in the volume is a memorandum of articles the diarist was to purchase in Hartford, Conn., and several miscellaneous accounts, 1818-1822.
